verses.name: Jeremiah 25:16
verses.text: And they shall drink, and be moved, and be mad, because of the sword that I will send among them.

verses.name: Jeremiah 25:17
verses.text: Then took I the cup at the Lord’s hand, and made all the nations to drink, unto whom the Lord had sent me:

verses.name: Jeremiah 25:18
verses.text: To wit, Jerusalem, and the cities of Judah, and the kings thereof, and the princes thereof, to make them a desolation, an astonishment, an hissing, and a curse; as it is this day;

verses.name: Jeremiah 25:19
verses.text: Pharaoh king of Egypt, and his servants, and his princes, and all his people;
